wsps-content: Current list of synced Wiki pages
wsps-content_share_information:
With this function you can share your current tagged files as a ZIP file without Sync information.

You can also restore such a ZIP file. This will only create the pages within the ZIP file, but will not change PageSync information.
If you restore pages that are already present in your Wiki, then PageSync will update its sync information.
wsps-content_no_backups: You currently have no backups of synced files
wsps-content_no_shares: You currently have no files that can be shared
wsps-page-tags-error-adding: Tags error. Could not add tags to this page
wsps-page-tags-label: Choose existing tags or create new tags
wsps-javascript_delete_share_text: Are you sure you want to delete this share file?
wsps-javascript_delete_backup_text: Are you sure you want to delete this backup file?
wsps-javascript_restore_backup_text: Are you sure you want to restore this backup file. All current synced pages will be deleted and restored from backup!
wsps-api-error-no-config-body: No configuration found. Please set configuration first!
wsps-error_no_page_id: No page Id. Page might be deleted.
wsps-error_special-page: You cannot PageSync this page (pages like Special pages cannot be synced).
wsps-error_file_consistency_1: As of version 0.9.9.9 the synced files have different content.
wsps-error_file_consistency_2: We need to convert the old file content to the new version.
wsps-error_file_consistency_3: Click the button 'convert files' to start the process.
wsps-error_file_consistency_4: You can click 'backup files' first to backup your current synced files to a zip archive.
wsps-error_file_not_in_index: * File is not in index. Use maintenance script to rebuild index based on files. Converting will not remove the error with this file.
wsps-error_file_consistency_count: We currently have $1 old version files synced.
wsps-special_count: We currently have $1 synced pages in the wiki
wsps-special_backup_we_need_zip_extensio:
Disabled
PHP ZIPArchive extension is not loaded. Please contact the website administrator.
wsps-special_share_older: You cannot install these shared files as the PageSync version is not compatible with your version ( < v2.0.0 )
wsps-special_share_delete_file_success: Share File $1 successfully deleted.
wsps-special_share_delete_file_error: Share File $1 could not be deleted. Please contact the website administrator.
wsps-special_backup_delete_file_error: Backup File $1 could not be deleted. Please contact the website administrator.
wsps-special_backup_delete_file_success: Backup File $1 successfully deleted.
wsps-special_backup_restore_file_success: Backup File $1 successfully restored.
wsps-special_backup_restore_file_failure: Backup File $1 could not be restored.
Backup File $1 could not be restored. Version is to old.
wsps-special_share_choose_options1: Pages must have all chosen tags
wsps-special_share_choose_options2: Pages must have at least one chosen tag
wsps-special_share_choose_options3: Ignore tags and select all synced pages
wsps-special_share_default_disclaimer: You are free to use these PageSync shared documents and files. We are however not responsible for any mishap it might cause when you submit them to your MediaWiki instalment.
wsps-special_custom_query_we_need_smw:
Disabled
To use Semantic Ask Queries, we need the Semantic MediaWiki extension. Please contact the website administrator.
wsps-special_custom_query_result_text1: We currently have $1 queried {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}} in the wiki
wsps-special_custom_query_add_results: Click to add all pages not already in PageSync
wsps-special_custom_query_add_tags: Additionally add Tags to all added pages
wsps-special_delete_card_result: All done! Successfully deleted $1 {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} ( every sync consists of two files ) $2 {{PLURAL:$2|fail|fails}}
apihelp-wsps-param-what: Action to take; valid values are 'add', 'remove', 'gettags' and 'updatetags'
apihelp-wsps-param-pageId: Page ID of the page to add or remove
apihelp-wsps-param-tags: When updating tags, this should be a comma seperated string holding all the tags
apihelp-wsps-example-3: Get tags for page ID 123. Status ok when correct and tags hold the current tags.
apihelp-wsps-example-4: Update tags for page ID 123. Will simply override all existing tags.
